venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
Join your Neighbors in Fellowship, Food and Song!

View the flyer here

Schedule of Events:
12:30 - 2:00pm Ethnic Luncheon & Fellowship
2:00 - 3:30pm Global Song in Local Worship

Global Song in Local Worship:
Professor Patrick Evans, Associate professor in the Practice of Sacred Music at Yale Divinity School and the Artist in Residence at New York’s Broadway Presbyterian Church, is committed to reclaiming and renewal of congregational song.
Highlights
¨ Why sing global song in local worship?
¨ What happens when we do?
¨ Practical ways to teach and learn that are respectful of others
item.name: Global Song in Local Worship
